fonts.description: First page of the Madinah Mushaf in TTX form. Convert to OTF/WOFF before shipping to the browser.
Second page of the Madinah Mushaf in TTX form. Bundle remaining pages as needed.

note: Convert the TTX payloads with FontTools: `ttx -f -o mushaf-madinah.ttf QCF_P001.ttx` and then `ttx -f -o mushaf-madinah.woff2 -t woff2 mushaf-madinah.ttf`. Repeat for other pages as needed.
